get.summary: Get a minutely domain feed batch

code-samples.code:
import requests
import io
import bz2
import json
import os

url = "https://www.virustotal.com/api/v3/feeds/domains/{time}"


response = requests.get(
    url.format(time="202002070300"),
    headers={'x-apikey': '<your VT API key>'})

if response.status_code != 200:
  raise Exception(response.content)
else:
  with io.BytesIO(response.content) as f:
    url_feed = [json.loads(line) for line in bz2.decompress(f.read()).splitlines()]
# further processing

get.summary: Get a minutely IP address feed batch

code-samples.code:
import requests
import io
import bz2
import json
import os

url = "https://www.virustotal.com/api/v3/feeds/ip_addresses/{time}"


response = requests.get(
    url.format(time="202002070300"),
    headers={'x-apikey': '<your VT API key>'})

if response.status_code != 200:
  raise Exception(response.content)
else:
  with io.BytesIO(response.content) as f:
    url_feed = [json.loads(line) for line in bz2.decompress(f.read()).splitlines()]
# further processing

get.summary: Get a minutely URL feed batch

code-samples.code:
import requests
import io
import bz2
import json
import os

url = "https://www.virustotal.com/api/v3/feeds/urls/{time}"


response = requests.get(
    url.format(time="202002070300"),
    headers={'x-apikey': '<your VT API key>'})

if response.status_code != 200:
  raise Exception(response.content)
else:
  with io.BytesIO(response.content) as f:
    url_feed = [json.loads(line) for line in bz2.decompress(f.read()).splitlines()]
# further processing

get.summary: Lists Alerts Notifications

parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: If present, only return notifications with a severity greater or equal to this value. Severities are: `low`, `medium`, `high`, `critical`

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: If present, filter only notifications from this asset watchlist.

parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.description: If present, filter only notifications for this entity type. One of: `DOMAIN`, `URL`, `IP`, `FILE`

parameters.name: last_n_hours
parameters.description: If present, retrieve only notifications N hours old, or younger.

parameters.name: detection_category
parameters.description: If present, only return notifications with this detection category. Categories are `BRAND_MATCH`, `DETECTED_DOMAIN`, `DETECTED_IP`, `DETECTED_URL`, `DOMAIN_TYPOSQUATTING`, `FAVICON_REUSE`, `FILE_COMMUNICATING_WITH_DOMAIN`, `FILE_COMMUNICATING_WITH_IP`, `FILE_COMMUNICATING_WITH_URL`, `FILE_DOWNLOADED_FROM_DOMAIN`, `FILE_DOWNLOADED_FROM_IP`, `FILE_DOWNLOADED_FROM_URL`, `PATTERN_EMBEDDED_IN_FILE`, `SUBDOMAIN_ABUSE`.

parameters.name: use_case_category
parameters.description: If present, only return notifications with this use case category. Categories are `BRAND_IMPERSONATION`, `CORPORATE_INFRASTRUCTURE_ABUSE`, `PHISHING_COUNTERFEITING`, `POTENTIAL_FALSE_POSITIVE`.

parameters.name: message_contains
parameters.description: If present, will search and match inside the event_message_json field of the Notification

get.summary: Get a single Alerts Notification
